ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Ursa Major s spark floated up.  She looked around and saw that she was floating through a long tunnel filled with blue light.  The light swirled around her.

Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>


Ursa Major's spark floated up.  She looked around and saw that she was 
floating through a long tunnel filled with blue light.  The light swirled 
around her.  She remembered dieing, but couldn't remember how she had gotten 
here. She floated along until she came to a great opening.  It was 
beautiful.  It was filled with white light and swirling colors.  Balls of 
different colored light flew past her and around her.  She felt at peace 
with where she was.

She floated past the light and into a space.  It was dark with a light 
wirlpool in the center. She floated over to the swirling light pool.  It 
spoke to her.  It told her to return to the world of the living.  She had 
sacrificed herself to save another and was worthy of another chance at life. 
  She turned and floated back past the white light and back into the dark 
tunnel.

When she awoke, she was at the lake shore.  She felt the cool lake water 
lapping at her feet.  She rose slowly to her feet.

"What?  I'm alive? How is that possable? Wasn't I dead?"  She looked around 
at her surroundings. "Where am I? What am I?"

She turned and looked into a small pool at the waters edge.  She had been 
transformed into a river otter. She suddenly forgot her death experience and 
looked at herself.  She had sleek dark brown fur, a long tail, sharp little 
claws, and an over whelming urge to go swimming.
She dived intot he lake and swam around for an hour.  She felt free.  She 
felt alive.

After swimig, she crawled out of the water and transformed into her bot 
mode.  She looked at her reflection in the water. "Gee I look good."

She walked around the lake looking for another bot to talk to.

ENTER THE MAXIMAL ::Fidgit::
